商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款修身短袖印花襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 海軍藍白色錨印花
留言內容: This is a good looking shirt. It's great for the price. However I have a few criticisms:- The shirt itself looks pretty good and is the right length on me. However, it is way too wide. I am 6 foot 3 with an athletic build (205 pounds), and I always have trouble finding shirts that fit right. If you are tall and a little chubbier, this would probably fit you well. There is just too much space in the front of the shirt for it to look good on me - would be great if there was a "slimmer" version of this.- From past purchases with Amazon, I know that this type of material wrinkles after washing. If you don't mind ironing your clothes after every wear then great, but I got tired of doing this with other shirts I ordered. Definitely not wrinkle resistant.- Out of the package it smells really bad. Like synthetic fibers, but a lot worse than most of the amazon basics items I've gotten.Overall not bad but I will not be keeping this because it just doesn't look good on me.

留言內容: Ordered last minute to wear on a cruise and worked out great. The material is what you would expect considering the price but overall the shirt is lightweight, comfortable and looks nice.

留言內容: Really love this shirt on my hubby. He is 5'9" and 175 lbs & his neck size is 16-1/2" for reference. He isn't usually a fan of small prints but it won him over & he wore this on a 103° temp balmy day & managed to stay cool. I'm gonna probably dry clean it to have it not shrink & get it pressed. Normally cotton like this wrinkles & shrinks and I want to preserve it!
